name: Flip Surfing Stunt Skills - 3D Surfer Racing Game
name_original: Flip Surfing Stunt Skills - 3D Surfer Racing Game
description:
One of the Most addictive Surfing game on AppStore!

Feel as if you are on a surfboard performing some crazy Stunts!!

Flip Surfing Stunt Skills gives you the thrilling experience of real surfing .

* Featuring incredible physics engine with animated rag doll physics.
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* 30 Exciting Levels


Download Now
